maqras.text: 15|1|Alipha-lama-raa, e'ibora haiche mahagrantha arau suspasta kora'anara ayata.
15|2|Kaphirasakale eta samayata akanksa karaiba ye, yadi sihamta mumina ha’lehemtena
15|3|Erai diya sihamtaka, sihamta kha'i thakaka arau bhoga karai thakaka, arau asa-akanksa'i sihamtaka gaphila karai raakhaka, eteke acirae'i sihamte janiba paraiba.
15|4|Arau ami yi janapadake'i dhbansa karaicho tara babe eta nirdista kala lipibad'dha achila.
15|5|Kono jatiye tara nirdista (dhbansara) kalaka aguraa'i aniba noraarae arau pichuraa'i'o niba noraarae.
15|6|Arau sihamte kaya, ‘heraa manuhajana! Yara prati yikira aratirna haiche, niscaya tumi ejana unmada’.
15|7|Yadi tumi satyabadisakalara antarbhukta tente amara ocarata phiraista upasthita nakaraa kiya
15|8|ami phiraistasakalaka yathartha karanabihina praerana nakarao, arau (phiraistasakala upasthita ha’le) tetiya sihamta arakasa'o napalehemtena.
15|9|Niscaya amiye'i kora'ana aratirna karaicho arau arasye amiye'i iyara samraksaka.
15|10|Arasye ami tomara purbe atita sampradayasamuhara majata raachula praerana karaicho.
15|11|Arau sihamtara ocarata ene kono raachula aha na'i yaka sihamte upahasa karaa nachila.
15|12|E'idarae'i ami aparaadhisakalara antarata seya sancara karao
15|13|ihamta kora'anara prati imana posana nakaraiba, arau arasye para haiche purbarartisakalara raiti.
15|14|Arau yadi ami sihamtara babe akasara duraara khuli dilohemtena, arau sihamta tata araohana karaile haya
15|15|tathapi'o sihamta ka’lehemtena ye, ‘amara drsti sanmohita karaa haiche, baram ami eta yadugrasta sampradaya’.
15|16|Arau arasye ami akasata baraujasamuha srsti karaicho arau darsakasakalara babe se'iboraka saundaryamaya karaicho.
15|17|Arau pratyeka abhisapta cayatanara paraa ami se'iboraka suraksita karaicho
15|18|kintu konoba'i luka'i-curakai suniba dharaile pradipta sikha'i tara picha laya.
15|19|Arau prthirai, iyaka ami bistrta karaicho, tata ami sthapana karaicho parbatamala; lagate tata ami pratyeka bastu udagata karaicho suparaimitabharae
15|20|arau tata ami jiraikara byarastha karaicho tomalokara babe arau tomaloka yiborara jiraikadata nahaya se'iborara babe'o.
15|21|Arau amara ocarate'i ache pratyeka bastura bhandara arau ami seya paraijnata paraimane'i aratirna karao.
15|22|Arau amiye'i urbara bayu praerana karao, tara pichata akasara paraa pani barsana karao, seya tomalokaka pana karaibalai di'om; athaca tomaloka nije seya bhandarata sancayakarai nahaya.
15|23|Arau amiye'i jirana dana karao arau mrtyu ghata'om arau amiye'i curanta malikanara adhikarai.
15|24|Arau niscaya ami tomalokara majara paraa yisakale agragami haiche sihamtaka jano arau arasye sihamtako jano yisakale pascadagami haiche.
15|25|Niscaya tomara pratipalake sihamtaka samabeta karaiba; niscaya te'om prajnamaya, sarbajna.
15|26|Arau arasye ami manuhaka srsti karaicho gandhayukta bokara sukana tim tim sabda karaa ka’labaraniya matira paraa
15|27|arau iyara agata ami jbinaboraka srsti karaicho uttapta agnisikhara paraa.

15|28|Arau smarana karaa, yetiya tomara pratipalake phiraistasakalaka kaichila, ‘niscaya ma'i gandhayukta bokara sukana tim tim sabda karaa ka’labaraniya matirae manuha srsti karaibalai thiraam karaicho
15|29|eteke yetiya ma'i taka suthama karaima arau tara majata mora phalara paraa rauha sancara karaima tetiya tomaloke tara prati chajadaranata ha’ba
15|30|tara pichata phiraistasakale sakalorae ekelage chajadaha karaile
15|31|kerala ibalichara bahirae, si chajadahakarai sakalara antarbhukta ha’balai asbikara karaile.
15|32|Allahe ka’le, ‘he ibalicha! Tomara ki ha’la, tumi kiya chajadahakarai sakalara antarbhukta naha’la’
15|33|si ka’le, ‘(he allaha!) Tumi gandhayukta bokara sukana tim tim sabda karaa ka’labaraniya matira paraa yi manuha srsti karaicha ma'i taka chajadaha nakarao’.
15|34|Te'om ka’le, ‘tente ta'i iyara paraa ola'i ya, karana niscaya ta'i abhisapta
15|35|arau niscaya pratidana dirasa laike tora oparata thakila abhisampata.
15|36|Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Teneha’le moka arakasa diya se'i dinalaike, yidina sihamtaka punaraujjiraita karaa ha’ba’.
15|37|Te'om ka’le, ‘ya, niscaya toka arakasa diya ha’la
15|38|‘sunirdista samaya ahara dina paryanta’.

15|39|Si ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Tumi ye moka bipathagami karaila se'i babe arasye ma'i prthiraita papakarmasamuhaka manuhara ocarata sobhaniya karai tulima arau arasye ami sihamtara ata'ike bipathagami karaima
15|40|‘kintu sihamtara majata tomara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae’.
15|41|Allahe ka’le, ‘e'itorae mora ocaralai ahara sarala patha’.
15|42|‘Niscaya mora bandasakalara oparata tomara kono ksamata na'i, kintu pathabhrastasakalara bahirae yisakale tomaka anusarana karaiba’
15|43|‘niscaya jahannama sihamta sakalorae pratisrauta sthana’
15|44|‘se'itora satakhana duraara ache, pratyeka duraaraerae praraesa karaibalai (cayatanara anusaraisakalara babe) nirdista ansa ache’.
15|45|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau prasraranasamuhara majata.
15|46|Te'omlokaka koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke santi arau niraapattara saite iyata praraesa karaa’.
15|47|Arau ami te'omlokara antarara paraa hinsa bidbesa amtaraa'i dima; te'omloke bhatrra darae parasparae ijane sijanara sanmukhara asanata arasthana karaiba
15|48|tata te'omlokaka arasade (klantiye) sparsa nakaraiba arau tara paraa te'omlokaka bahiskrta'o karaa naha’ba.
15|49|Mora bandasakalaka jana'i diya ye, niscaya ma'i parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
